attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in Boris Johnson by the people of the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Stand up and make it abundantly clear that the UK does not want Boris Johnson as our Prime Minister. 

A man who flouts the rules.  A man who has laughed in the face of every person who obeyed the rules during Lockdown and missed family and loved ones.  A man who has no understanding of the struggles people are going through in paying to eat and heat their homes.
attributes.background: We, the people, are calling for the immediate resignation of Boris Johnson and an election called to bring in a government that respects the rules and looks after the general public.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
